__e: No, I don't have a crystal ball, but if the parking's not enough,
You may have the crystal, but you still need me.
When I touch the crystal and I think of someone, I can see where they are.
It was like looking into a crystal ball, And I didn't like what I saw.
We acknowledge that you are in control of the crystal, without it we can do nothing, so...
The control crystal is useless without enough power.
Not only am I okay, but this crystal of yours makes me feel 20 years younger.
As soon as she gets the crystal back, you're dead, just like Henry.
Oh that's my crystal decanter for my father's sixty-fifth birthday.
I don't think you can count on whatever's on that crystal to get you out of this.
I don't need a crystal ball to see you're about to ask me for something.
I know more about that crystal than you do.
Is there anything you didn't tell me about the Crystal Dad left me?
All I want is the crystal that belonged to my mother.
-Then if the rest of the legend is accurate... I will soon be master of the Crystal of Power.
And it appears that the time crystal is missing.
